mapper.insert: insert into spboard (bno, title, writer, content, passwd) values (spboard_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{passwd})
mapper.select: select bno, title, writer, regdate, uptodate, cnt from spboard order by bno desc
select bno, title, writer, content, regdate, uptodate from spboard where bno = #{bno}
select count(*) from spboard where bno = #{bno} and passwd = #{passwd}
mapper.update: update spboard set title = #{title}, writer = #{writer}, content = #{content}, uptodate = sysdate where bno = #{bno}
